summary: Phases 0-2 completed. Phases 3-6 blocked by fundamental design flaw: canonical history construction assumes same MCS at all times, which requires temporal T-axioms (G phi -> phi, H phi -> phi) that TM logic does NOT have. Architectural redesign needed to allow different MCS at different times.

artifacts.summary: Re-exports Boneyard MCS theory for set-based maximal consistent sets
CanonicalWorld D structure pairing MCS with time point (2 sorries)
Task relation definition with nullity proven (6 sorries in compositionality)
UniversalCanonicalFrame and canonical history (2 sorries for T-axiom)
Detailed analysis of design flaw and recommended fixes

completion_data.completion_summary: Partially implemented universal parametric canonical model. Phases 0-2 completed (archive, setup, MCS infrastructure, CanonicalWorld structure). Phases 3-6 blocked by fundamental issue: canonical history construction requires temporal T-axioms absent from TM logic. Detailed analysis and recommendations documented.

next_steps: Redesign canonical history to use different MCS at different times connected by formula propagation. See implementation summary for detailed recommendations (Option 1: Full redesign ~20-30 hours, Option 2: Use existing SemanticCanonicalModel, Option 3: Hybrid approach).
